sect1.title: Delegate Collections and Maps
sect1.para: There are two useful classes to help developers implement the Delegate pattern with collections and maps.

sect2.title: Xyster\Collection\Delegate
sect2.para: This class is a delegate Xyster\Collection\ICollection.

sect2.title: Xyster\Collection\DelegateMap
